Qieyun: 匣合一泰去?, 見合一泰去?

English: a blade; a knife. to kill.
to destroy by fire; to exterminate. to extinguish fire.

Qieyun: 精開一侯上?, 精開一侯去?
English: to walk; to go; to travel.
to fill; to be full; abundant.

Qieyun: 影合三元平?, 影合三元去?
以開三支去?, 以開三清入?

English: a hole. Great. The surname of Confucius.

Qieyun: 見開四青平?, 見開四青去?
English: to pass; the past; already: a particle of completed action. The "Canon" of Confucianism.
the eye; to regard. an index.

Qieyun: 溪三鍾上?, 溪三鍾去?
云三尤去?, 云三東入?

English: a village; a place of residence. a measure of length (about 1/2 kilometer).

Qieyun: 見合一寒入?, 匣合一寒入?

English: to transgress; to commit a crime.
to tread on; to trample on.
a rut; the track of a wheel; a precedent.

Qieyun: 崇合二刪上?, 崇合三仙去?

English: cause; motive; origin. from; by; because. to follow. a proper name.
a marsh; moist. to fertilize; to show kindness.
a high official; a noble. Sir; you.

Qieyun: 清開三支去?, 清開三清入?
English: a thorn. to prick; to stab.

Qieyun: 書合三祭去?, 以合三仙入?, 書合三仙入?

English: one with the gift of talk.
a drum; to drum; to beat; to excite.
